events.text:
=== LEVEL 1 TINGKAT 3: MATCH THE DOLLS ===
Mekanik: Drag boneka kecil ke boneka besar yang cocok
Developers: Eko Muchamad Haryono & Anang Febryan Sutarja
Date: November 10, 2025

NOTE: Game logic ada di scripts/level1_tingkat3.js

=== CARA BERMAIN ===
1. Drag boneka KECIL dari dalam kamar
2. Drop ke boneka BESAR di bagian bawah yang cocok
3. Jika cocok, boneka kecil akan hilang dan score bertambah
4. Selesaikan semua 5 boneka untuk menang!

=== SCORE SYSTEM ===
- 150 poin per boneka yang cocok
- Perfect score: 750 poin
- ⭐⭐⭐ 3 stars: 600+ poin
- ⭐⭐ 2 stars: 450+ poin
- ⭐ 1 star: 300+ poin

=== DRAG & DROP EVENTS ===
Tambahkan Drag & Drop behavior ke semua boneka kecil di Construct 3 Editor:
- boneka1lvl1t3 → Add Behavior → Drag & Drop
- boneka2lvl1t3 → Add Behavior → Drag & Drop
- boneka3lvl1t3 → Add Behavior → Drag & Drop
- boneka4lvl1t3 → Add Behavior → Drag & Drop
- boneka5lvl1t3 → Add Behavior → Drag & Drop

Kemudian tambahkan events berikut untuk masing-masing boneka:

=== CONTOH EVENT (Manual Setup di Construct 3) ===

Event: boneka1lvl1t3 → On drop
  Condition: boneka1lvl1t3 is overlapping boneka1lvl1t3out
  Action: Script → lvl1t3_onDollDropped(0);

Event: boneka2lvl1t3 → On drop
  Condition: boneka2lvl1t3 is overlapping boneka2lvl1t3out
  Action: Script → lvl1t3_onDollDropped(1);

Event: boneka3lvl1t3 → On drop
  Condition: boneka3lvl1t3 is overlapping boneka3lvl1t3out
  Action: Script → lvl1t3_onDollDropped(2);

Event: boneka4lvl1t3 → On drop
  Condition: boneka4lvl1t3 is overlapping boneka4lvl1t3out
  Action: Script → lvl1t3_onDollDropped(3);

Event: boneka5lvl1t3 → On drop
  Condition: boneka5lvl1t3 is overlapping boneka5lvl1t3out
  Action: Script → lvl1t3_onDollDropped(4);

=== RESET POSITION (Opsional) ===
Jika ingin boneka kembali ke posisi awal saat drop salah:

Event: boneka1lvl1t3 → On drop
  Condition: boneka1lvl1t3 is NOT overlapping boneka1lvl1t3out
  Action: Script → lvl1t3_resetDollPosition(0);
